description: ALDM for Party domain in the Master Data Management system

entities.name: Party
entities.description: A person or organization that can enter into business relationships

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the party

attributes.name: party_name
attributes.description: The name of the party as it is known in business

attributes.name: party_type
attributes.description: Type of party (Person or Organization)

attributes.name: party_date_time
attributes.description: Date and time when the party record was created

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Current status of the party

attributes.name: data_source_system
attributes.description: System where this party data originated

attributes.name: data_source_id
attributes.description: ID of this party in the source system

attributes.name: is_golden_record
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this is the golden record

attributes.name: data_quality_score
attributes.description: Calculated data quality score from 0-100

attributes.name: confidence_score
attributes.description: Confidence level in the correctness of this record

attributes.name: last_verified_date
attributes.description: Date when this record was last verified

attributes.name: party_identification
attributes.description: A general identification for the party (e.g., TaxID)

attributes.name: data_steward_id
attributes.description: ID of the data steward responsible for this party

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User who created this record

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: updated_by
attributes.description: User who last updated this record

attributes.name: deleted_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was marked as deleted

attributes.name: preferred_language
attributes.description: Preferred language for communication

attributes.name: residential_status
attributes.description: Residential status in the country of residence

attributes.description: Type of entry in the directory

attributes.description: Date of the entry in the directory

attributes.description: Period for which the directory entry is valid

attributes.description: Flag indicating if this reference has been verified

attributes.description: Date when this reference was verified

entities.name: PartyMergeHistory
entities.description: History of party merges in the MDM system

attributes.name: party_merge_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this merge record

attributes.name: survivor_party_id
attributes.description: ID of the surviving party

attributes.name: merged_party_id
attributes.description: ID of the merged party

attributes.name: merge_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the merge occurred

attributes.name: merge_reason
attributes.description: Reason for the merge

attributes.name: merge_score
attributes.description: Confidence score for the merge

attributes.name: merge_rule
attributes.description: Rule used for the merge

attributes.name: approved_by
attributes.description: User who approved the merge

attributes.name: approval_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the merge was approved

attributes.name: merged_record_json
attributes.description: JSON representation of the merged record

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Current status of the merge

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User who created this record

entities.name: PartyMatchRule
entities.description: Rules for matching parties in the MDM system

attributes.name: match_rule_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this match rule

attributes.name: rule_name
attributes.description: Name of the match rule

attributes.name: rule_description
attributes.description: Description of the match rule

attributes.name: rule_type
attributes.description: Type of match rule

attributes.name: rule_definition
attributes.description: Definition of the match rule in JSON format

attributes.name: threshold
attributes.description: Threshold for considering a match

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: Priority of this rule in the matching hierarchy

attributes.name: party_type
attributes.description: Type of party this rule applies to

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this rule is active

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User who created this rule

attributes.name: updated_by
attributes.description: User who last updated this rule

entities.name: PartyAuditLog
entities.description: Audit log for party data changes in the MDM system

attributes.name: audit_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this audit record

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: ID of the party being audited

attributes.name: entity_name
attributes.description: Name of the entity being audited

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: Action performed on the entity

attributes.name: action_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the action was performed

attributes.name: user_id
attributes.description: ID of the user who performed the action

attributes.name: ip_address
attributes.description: IP address from which the action was performed

attributes.name: old_values
attributes.description: JSON representation of the old values

attributes.name: new_values
attributes.description: JSON representation of the new values

attributes.name: change_reason
attributes.description: Reason for the change

attributes.name: source_system
attributes.description: System from which the change originated

entities.name: PartyDataQuality
entities.description: Data quality metrics for party data in the MDM system

attributes.name: data_quality_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this data quality record

attributes.name: party_id
attributes.description: ID of the party being assessed

attributes.name: assessment_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the assessment was performed

attributes.name: completeness_score
attributes.description: Score for data completeness (0-100)

attributes.name: accuracy_score
attributes.description: Score for data accuracy (0-100)

attributes.name: consistency_score
attributes.description: Score for data consistency (0-100)

attributes.name: timeliness_score
attributes.description: Score for data timeliness (0-100)

attributes.name: uniqueness_score
attributes.description: Score for data uniqueness (0-100)

attributes.name: overall_score
attributes.description: Overall data quality score (0-100)

attributes.name: issues_found
attributes.description: JSON representation of data quality issues found

attributes.name: improvement_suggestions
attributes.description: JSON representation of suggestions for improvement

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User or system that created this record
